verses.verse: וִיהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <S%H3091><s%> Now Joshua זָקֵ֔ן <S%H2204><s%> was old בָּ֖א <S%H935><s%> [and] stricken בַּיָּמִ֑ים <S%H3117><s%> in years וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> about אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> You זָקַ֙נְתָּה֙ <S%H2204><s%> unto him Thou art old בָּ֣אתָ <S%H935><s%> [and] stricken בַיָּמִ֔ים <S%H3117><s%> in years וְהָאָ֛רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land נִשְׁאֲרָ֥ה <S%H7604><s%> and there remaineth הַרְבֵּֽה־ <S%H7235><s%> much מְאֹ֖ד <S%H3966><s%> yet very לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3423><s%> to be possessed

זֹ֥את <S%H2063><s%> likewise הָאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> This [is] the land הַנִּשְׁאָ֑רֶת <S%H7604><s%> that yet remaineth כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all גְּלִיל֥וֹת <S%H1552><s%> all the borders הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַגְּשׁוּרִֽי׃ <S%H1651><s%> and all Geshuri

מִֽן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַשִּׁיח֞וֹר <S%H7883><s%> From Sihor אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> which [is] before מִצְרַ֗יִם <S%H4714><s%> Egypt וְעַ֨ד <S%H5704><s%> far גְּב֤וּל <S%H1366><s%> even unto the borders עֶקְרוֹן֙ <S%H6138><s%> of Ekron צָפ֔וֹנָה <S%H6828><s%> northward לַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י <S%H3669><s%> to the Canaanite תֵּחָשֵׁ֑ב <S%H2803><s%> [which] is counted חֲמֵ֣שֶׁת ׀ <S%H2568><s%> five סַרְנֵ֣י <S%H5633><s%> lords פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines הָעַזָּתִ֤י <S%H5841><s%> the Gazathites וְהָאַשְׁדּוֹדִי֙ <S%H796><s%> and the Ashdothites הָאֶשְׁקְלוֹנִ֣י <S%H832><s%> the Eshkalonites הַגִּתִּ֔י <S%H1663><s%> the Gittites וְהָעֶקְרוֹנִ֖י <S%H6139><s%> and the Ekronites וְהָעַוִּֽים׃ <S%H5757><s%> Avims

מִתֵּימָ֞ן <S%H8486><s%> From the south כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> all the land הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֗י <S%H3669><s%> of the Canaanites וּמְעָרָ֛ה <S%H4632><s%> and Mearah אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> that לַצִּידֹנִ֖ים <S%H6722><s%> that [is] beside the Sidonians עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far אֲפֵ֑קָה <S%H663><s%> unto Aphek עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> far גְּב֥וּל <S%H1366><s%> to the borders הָאֱמֹרִֽי׃ <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites

וְהָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> And the land הַגִּבְלִ֗י <S%H1382><s%> of the Giblites וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַלְּבָנוֹן֙ <S%H3844><s%> and all Lebanon מִזְרַ֣ח <S%H4217><s%> east side הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> east side מִבַּ֣עַל גָּ֔ד <S%H1171><s%> from Baalgad תַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> below הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> under mount חֶרְמ֑וֹן <S%H2768><s%> Hermon עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> far לְב֥וֹא <S%H935><s%> unto the entering חֲמָֽת׃ <S%H2574><s%> into Hamath

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> All the inhabitants הָ֠הָר <S%H2022><s%> of the hill country מִֽן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַלְּבָנ֞וֹן <S%H3844><s%> from Lebanon עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far מִשְׂרְפֹ֥ת מַ֙יִם֙ <S%H4956><s%> unto Misrephothmaim כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all צִ֣ידֹנִ֔ים <S%H6722><s%> [and] all the Sidonians אָֽנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I אוֹרִישֵׁ֔ם <S%H3423><s%> them will I drive out מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> from before בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel רַ֠ק <S%H7535><s%> but הַפִּלֶ֤הָ <S%H5307><s%> only divide thou it by lot לְיִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> unto the Israelites בְּֽנַחֲלָ֔ה <S%H5159><s%> for an inheritance כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> I צִוִּיתִֽיךָ׃ <S%H6680><s%> as I have commanded

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now חַלֵּ֞ק <S%H2505><s%> Now therefore divide אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֧רֶץ <S%H776><s%> this land הַזֹּ֛את <S%H2063><s%> for בְּנַחֲלָ֖ה <S%H5159><s%> for an inheritance לְתִשְׁעַ֣ת <S%H8672><s%> unto the nine הַשְּׁבָטִ֑ים <S%H7626><s%> tribes וַחֲצִ֖י <S%H2677><s%> and the half הַשֵּׁ֥בֶט <S%H7626><s%> tribe הַֽמְנַשֶּֽׁה׃ <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh

עִמּ֗וֹ <S%H5973><s%> the other הָרֽאוּבֵנִי֙ <S%H7206><s%> With whom the Reubenites וְהַגָּדִ֔י <S%H1425><s%> and the Gadites לָקְח֖וּ <S%H3947><s%> have received נַחֲלָתָ֑ם <S%H5159><s%> their inheritance אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> gave לָהֶ֜ם מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> which Moses בְּעֵ֤בֶר <S%H5676><s%> them beyond הַיַּרְדֵּן֙ <S%H3383><s%> Jordan מִזְרָ֔חָה <S%H4217><s%> eastward כַּאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> gave לָהֶ֔ם מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> [even] as Moses עֶ֥בֶד <S%H5650><s%> the servant יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD

מֵעֲרוֹעֵ֡ר <S%H6177><s%> From Aroer אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is on שְׂפַת־ <S%H8193><s%> that [is] upon the bank נַ֨חַל <S%H5158><s%> of the river אַרְנ֜וֹן <S%H769><s%> Arnon וְהָעִ֨יר <S%H5892><s%> and the city אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּתוֹךְ־ <S%H8432><s%> that [is] in the midst הַנַּ֛חַל <S%H5158><s%> of the river וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַמִּישֹׁ֥ר <S%H4334><s%> and all the plain מֵידְבָ֖א <S%H4311><s%> of Medeba עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far דִּיבֽוֹן׃ <S%H1769><s%> unto Dibon

וְכֹ֗ל <S%H3605><s%> and all עָרֵי֙ <S%H5892><s%> And all the cities סִיחוֹן֙ <S%H5511><s%> of Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> which reigned בְּחֶשְׁבּ֑וֹן <S%H2809><s%> in Heshbon עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far גְּב֖וּל <S%H1366><s%> unto the border בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children עַמּֽוֹן׃ <S%H5983><s%> of Ammon

וְהַגִּלְעָ֞ד <S%H1568><s%> And Gilead וּגְב֧וּל <S%H1366><s%> and the border הַגְּשׁוּרִ֣י <S%H1651><s%> of the Geshurites וְהַמַּעֲכָתִ֗י <S%H4602><s%> and Maachathites וְכֹ֨ל <S%H3605><s%> and all הַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> and all mount חֶרְמ֛וֹן <S%H2768><s%> Hermon וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַבָּשָׁ֖ן <S%H1316><s%> and all Bashan עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> far סַלְכָֽה׃ <S%H5548><s%> unto Salcah

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all מַמְלְכ֥וּת <S%H4468><s%> All the kingdom עוֹג֙ <S%H5747><s%> of Og בַּבָּשָׁ֔ן <S%H1316><s%> in Bashan אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who מָלַ֥ךְ <S%H4427><s%> which reigned בְּעַשְׁתָּר֖וֹת <S%H6252><s%> in Ashtaroth וּבְאֶדְרֶ֑עִי <S%H154><s%> and in Edrei ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נִשְׁאַר֙ <S%H7604><s%> who remained מִיֶּ֣תֶר <S%H3499><s%> of the remnant הָרְפָאִ֔ים <S%H7497><s%> of the giants וַיַּכֵּ֥ם <S%H5221><s%> smite מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> for these did Moses וַיֹּרִשֵֽׁם׃ <S%H3423><s%> and cast them out

וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> did not הוֹרִ֙ישׁוּ֙ <S%H3423><s%> expelled בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> Nevertheless the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַגְּשׁוּרִ֖י <S%H1651><s%> not the Geshurites וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּעֲכָתִ֑י <S%H4602><s%> nor the Maachathites וַיֵּ֨שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> dwell גְּשׁ֤וּר <S%H1650><s%> but the Geshurites וּמַֽעֲכָת֙ <S%H4601><s%> and the Maachathites בְּקֶ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> among יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> the Israelites עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> until הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> until this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

רַ֚ק <S%H7535><s%> but לְשֵׁ֣בֶט <S%H7626><s%> Only unto the tribe הַלֵּוִ֔י <S%H3878><s%> of Levi לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not נָתַ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> he gave נַחֲלָ֑ה <S%H5159><s%> none inheritance אִשֵּׁ֨י <S%H801><s%> made by fire יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֤י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נַחֲלָת֔וֹ <S%H5159><s%> [are] their inheritance כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> he דִּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> as he said לֽוֹ׃ ס

וַיִּתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> gave מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses לְמַטֵּ֥ה <S%H4294><s%> unto the tribe בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children רְאוּבֵ֖ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <S%H4940><s%> [inheritance] according to their families

וַיְהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> become לָהֶ֜ם <S%H1992><s%> like הַגְּב֗וּל <S%H1366><s%> And their coast מֵעֲרוֹעֵ֡ר <S%H6177><s%> was from Aroer אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is on שְׂפַת־ <S%H8193><s%> that [is] on the bank נַ֨חַל <S%H5158><s%> of the river אַרְנ֜וֹן <S%H769><s%> Arnon וְהָעִ֨יר <S%H5892><s%> and the city אֲשֶׁ֧ר <S%H834><s%> which בְּתוֹךְ־ <S%H8432><s%> that [is] in the midst הַנַּ֛חַל <S%H5158><s%> of the river וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַמִּישֹׁ֖ר <S%H4334><s%> and all the plain עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> by מֵידְבָֽא׃ <S%H4311><s%> by Medeba

חֶשְׁבּ֥וֹן <S%H2809><s%> Heshbon וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עָרֶ֖יהָ <S%H5892><s%> and all her cities אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which בַּמִּישֹׁ֑ר <S%H4334><s%> that [are] in the plain דִּיבוֹן֙ <S%H1769><s%> Dibon וּבָמ֣וֹת בַּ֔עַל <S%H1120><s%> and Bamothbaal וּבֵ֖ית בַּ֥עַל מְעֽוֹן׃ <S%H1010><s%> and Bethbaalmeon
וְיַ֥הְצָה <S%H3096><s%> And Jahazah וּקְדֵמֹ֖ת <S%H6932><s%> and Kedemoth וּמֵפָֽעַת׃ <S%H4158><s%> and Mephaath

וְקִרְיָתַ֣יִם <S%H7156><s%> And Kirjathaim וְשִׂבְמָ֔ה <S%H7643><s%> and Sibmah וְצֶ֥רֶת הַשַּׁ֖חַר <S%H6890><s%> and Zarethshahar בְּהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> in the mount הָעֵֽמֶק׃ <S%H6010><s%> of the valley
וּבֵ֥ית פְּע֛וֹר <S%H1047><s%> And Bethpeor וְאַשְׁדּ֥וֹת <S%H794><s%> and the slopes הַפִּסְגָּ֖ה <S%H6449><s%> of Pisgah וּבֵ֥ית הַיְשִׁמֽוֹת׃ <S%H1020><s%> and Bethjeshimoth

וְכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> all עָרֵ֣י <S%H5892><s%> And all the cities הַמִּישֹׁ֔ר <S%H4334><s%> of the plain וְכָֽל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all מַמְלְכ֗וּת <S%H4468><s%> and all the kingdom סִיחוֹן֙ <S%H5511><s%> of Sihon מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> of the Amorites אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> which reigned בְּחֶשְׁבּ֑וֹן <S%H2809><s%> in Heshbon אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> whom הִכָּ֨ה <S%H5221><s%> smote מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> whom Moses אֹת֣וֹ ׀ <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נְשִׂיאֵ֣י <S%H5387><s%> with the princes מִדְיָ֗ן <S%H4080><s%> of Midian אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱוִ֤י <S%H189><s%> Evi וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֶ֙קֶם֙ <S%H7552><s%> and Rekem וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> צ֤וּר <S%H6698><s%> and Zur וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חוּר֙ <S%H2354><s%> and Hur וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֶ֔בַע <S%H7254><s%> and Reba נְסִיכֵ֣י <S%H5257><s%> [which were] dukes סִיח֔וֹן <S%H5511><s%> of Sihon יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> dwelling הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> in the country

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בִּלְעָ֥ם <S%H1109><s%> Balaam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> also the son בְּע֖וֹר <S%H1160><s%> of Beor הַקּוֹסֵ֑ם <S%H7080><s%> the soothsayer הָרְג֧וּ <S%H2026><s%> slay בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> did the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בַּחֶ֖רֶב <S%H2719><s%> with the sword אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> among them חַלְלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H2491><s%> that were slain

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> become גְּבוּל֙ <S%H1366><s%> And the border בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> of the children רְאוּבֵ֔ן <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben הַיַּרְדֵּ֖ן <S%H3383><s%> was Jordan וּגְב֑וּל <S%H1366><s%> and the border זֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> likewise נַחֲלַ֤ת <S%H5159><s%> [thereof] This [was] the inheritance בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children רְאוּבֵן֙ <S%H7205><s%> of Reuben לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֔ם <S%H4940><s%> after their families הֶעָרִ֖ים <S%H5892><s%> the cities וְחַצְרֵיהֶֽן׃ <S%H2691><s%> and the villages פ
